item.Q:
Write the character: zhuān
(zhuānmén de zhuān)
item.A:
traditional: 專
for a particular person, occasion, purpose; focused on one thing; special; expert; particular (to sth); concentrated; specialized
专门 (專門) zhuānmén specialist; specialized; customized

bùliào unexpectedly; to one's surprise
búliào unexpectedly
yuánliào raw material
dàliào Chinese anise; star anise
yìliào (v) anticipate; think ahead
liàozi material
liàoxiǎng to expect; to presume; to think (sth is likely)
liàolǐ to arrange; to handle; the ordinary Japanese word for cooking; cuisine (esp. foreign restaurants)

traditional: 生活資料
shēnghuózīliào living capital

traditional: 資料
zīliào data; material; information

traditional: 價錢
jìaqian price

traditional: 工錢
gōngqián salary; wages

traditional: 本錢
běnqián capital

traditional: 現錢
xiànqián (n) cash

traditional: 金錢
jīnqián money; currency

traditional: 不失時機
bùshīshíjī seize the opportune moment; lose no time

traditional: 不失為
bùshīwéi can still be considered (to be...); may after all be accepted as
shīshì (have an) accident
shīxìn to break a promise
shīxiū (n) disrepair
shīlì suffer defeat
shīqù to lose
shīdì former position

traditional: 失學
shīxué (v) lose opportunity to attend school
shīmíng to become blind; blindness
shīwàng be disappointed; to lose hope; to despair

traditional: 失業
shīyè unemployment
shīzhēn to lack fidelity

traditional: 失聲
shīshēng aphonia
shīzhòng weightlessness; zero gravity
déshī gains and losses
liúshī drainage; to run off; to wash away

traditional: 萬無一失
wànwúyīshī surefire; absolutely safe

traditional: 過失
guòshī defect; fault
kǒuchī stammer

chībuxìa not feel like eating; be unable to eat any more

traditional: 吃不開
chībukāi be unpopular; won't work
chīlì entail strenuous effort; be a strain
hǎochī tasty; delicious
xiǎochī snack; refreshments
zhùkǒu shut up; shut your mouth; stop talking
zhùsuǒ habitation

traditional: 住處
zhùchù residence; dwelling; dwelling place
zhùchǔ living place

bǎobuzhù most likely; more likely than not; may well
bǎobúzhù most likely

traditional: 對不住
duìbùzhù Im sorry
zhànzhù stand

traditional: 記住
jìzhu to remember
jíwèi to succeed to the throne; accession
jíshǐ even if; even though
jíbiàn even if; even though

traditional: 即將
jíjiāng on the eve of; to be about to; to be on the verge of
jírì this or that very day; in the next few days

traditional: 即時
jíshí immediate

traditional: 即興

zàijí to be at a critical point

traditional: 當即
dāngjí at once; on the spot
lìjí immediately
lìngyīfāngmiàn on the other hand; another aspect
lìngwài additional; in addition; besides; separate; other; moreover; furthermore
lìngxíng other method
